Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
November 2022 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Hello everybody, welcome to another edition of The Justia Insider! Autumn is already here, and the holiday season is just around the corner. The time to celebrate has come! So don’t miss the chance to get together with colleagues, family, and friends. Make sure you enjoy this holiday month to the fullest!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Justia Webinar Center: We launched a space dedicated to announcing and promoting the Justia Webinars presented by Justia Connect, showing both upcoming and past webinar recordings. This update improves our users' experience and how we organize, manage, and keep track of webinars internally.

Zoom Registration for Justia Webinars: Webinar attendees will now register directly through Justia Connect instead of Zoom. This was possible through the Zoom API integration, and it is a significant improvement for attendee tracking and follow-up notifications.

Justia Connect Pro Credit Increase: One of the benefits of becoming a Justia Connect Pro member is to get real credit to use on other Justia products and services. This month we increased this benefit from $100 to $200, boosting its value for our members.

Justia Elevate Reports: This month, we pushed the first automated version of our monthly reports for our Justia Elevate clients live. In addition to the PDF reports our clients already receive, we prepared a simplified version for the email contents this time. Both versions look awesome.

Justia Lawyer Directory Analysis Report: Our Data Team worked on a data analysis report for the Justia Lawyer Directory. The report not only focuses on essential insights for our business but it's also built to automatically update on its own as new information comes in, making it current and relevant at all times.

Migrated OAuth Flow: Our applications create and keep track of authentication tokens to access resources from Google services like Google Ads, Google Business Profiles, and Google Drive. We upgraded the process to create new tokens so it matches the latest standards.

IT Maintenances: As customary, our IT Team is on top of handling infrastructure upgrades and maintenance. This month they worked on servers related to projects like SEC Contracts and Justia Elevate storage system, among others.

Upgraded Development Environment: As part of the efforts involving the new Justia Jobs, we prepared a new version of our development environment with updated infrastructure (the OS), the development language, the application framework, and our internal shared application packages. This will allow us to start new projects (or even restart existing ones) with the latest features and security.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • New 50-State Surveys. We wrote 50-state surveys on foreclosure laws and procedures for the Foreclosure center, property division, and legal separation for the Divorce center. We also added car accident lawsuits for the Car Accidents center and wrongful death lawsuits for the Personal Injury center, respectively.
  • Additional Snippets. We have improved the accessibility and clarity of the Debt Relief & Management and the Insurance Law centers by writing more snippets emphasizing critical points in these areas.
  • Child Safety Center. We have started to research and compile a new center for our Justia Legal Guides on child safety and related legal issues at home, school, and online, among other places.
  • Justia Mexico and Latin America Portals. We have updated the information of some of the most recognized law firms and legal consultation attorneys in Mexico and other Latin American countries.

TEAM ACTIVITY

Justia Ghoulie Awards

On October 31st, we held our third Justia Ghoulie Awards! This is undoubtedly one of the most expected, exciting, and entertaining Justia events throughout the year. Once again, we had fantastic and spooktacular costumes. Thank you for participating and showing off your costumes in this year’s edition. We are already looking forward to having another successful edition full of enthusiasm and creativity! Congratulations to all the most-voted contestants in each category!

Justia Hackathon

The official 2022 Justia Hackathon began on October 27th. We wish good luck to the Engineering, IT, and QA Teams and other people who are participating. We can't wait to find out who the winners of this edition are! They will be announced in mid-November, and we will highlight them in next month's edition of The Justia Insider.

JUSTIA PET NEWS

Sweet Midna

Midna is turning four years old next month! She’s a super mutt who loves to give kisses and snuggle. Her favorite hobby is to be held so she can survey her kingdom from up high. She learned the word “cheese” and how to spell it, so now her parents call it “queso.” Please let her know if you have any cheese and if you’d share it with her.

upcoming holidays

Dates to Remember

Thanksgiving is a federal holiday in the United States, which takes place every fourth Thursday of November. It is based on the colonial Pilgrims' 1621 harvest meal with the Wampanoag people. Rich in legend and symbolism, the holiday is a time to give thanks for all the sacrifice and hard work done for the harvest.

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Alejandro Moreno, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Haydee Garcia, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
